question: Will Apple be the world's most valuable company by market cap on March 29, 2025?
reasoning:
Based on the information gathered:

1. **Apple's Market Cap**: As of March 2025, Apple has a market cap of $3.187 trillion USD, making it the world's most valuable company according to CompaniesMarketCap.

2. **Nvidia's Market Cap**: As of March 2025, Nvidia has a market cap of $2.850 trillion USD, making it the second most valuable company according to CompaniesMarketCap.

3. **Microsoft's Market Cap**: The available data suggests that Microsoft's market cap is less than Nvidia's, as Nvidia is listed as the second most valuable company.

4. **General Market Trends**: The Motley Fool article confirms that Apple and Nvidia are at the top of the list of the largest companies by market capitalization as of March 2025.

Given this information, Apple is currently the most valuable company by market cap, with no immediate competitors surpassing its valuation. The trends and data suggest that Apple is likely to maintain its position through March 29, 2025.

FINAL PROBABILITY: 0.85

Apple Inc. is an American hardware and software developer and technology company that develops and sells computers, smartphones and consumer electronics as well as operating systems and application software. Apple also operates internet sales portals for music, films and software.

As of March 2025 Apple has a market cap of $3.187 Trillion USD. This makes Apple the world's most valuable company by market cap according to our data. ---
title: NVIDIA (NVDA) - Market capitalization
url: https://companiesmarketcap.com/nvidia/marketcap/
hostname: companiesmarketcap.com
description: As of March 2025 NVIDIA has a market cap of $2.850 Trillion USD. This makes NVIDIA the world's 2nd most valuable company according to our data.
sitename: companiesmarketcap.com
date: 2025-03-17
---
Nvidia Corporation is one of the largest developers of graphics processors and chipsets for personal computers and game consoles. The head office is in Santa Clara, California. NVIDIA Corporation does not have its own manufacturing facilities and therefore works according to the fabless principle.

The company was founded in January 1993 by Jen-Hsun Huang, Curtis Priem and Chris Malachowsky. In May 1995, Nvidia launched the NV1 (STG-2000), one of the first 3D accelerator processors (GPU). In January 1999, Nvidia was included in the NASDAQ (NVDA) and delivered the ten millionth graphics chip in the same year.

As of March 2025 NVIDIA has a market cap of $2.850 Trillion USD. This makes NVIDIA the world's 2nd most valuable company by market cap according to our data. The market capitalization, commonly called market cap, is the total market value of a publicly traded company's outstanding shares and is commonly used to measure how much a company is worth.

search_results.content:
---
title: The Largest Companies by Market Cap in 2025 | The Motley Fool
author: Lyle Daly
url: https://www.fool.com/research/largest-companies-by-market-cap/
hostname: fool.com
description: Apple and Nvidia top the list of the biggest companies by market capitalization.
sitename: The Motley Fool
date: 2023-04-06
---
**Apple** ([NASDAQ:AAPL](https://www.fool.com/quote/nasdaq/aapl/)) currently tops the list of the largest companies in the world. **Nvidia** ([NASDAQ:NVDA](https://www.fool.com/quote/nasdaq/nvda/)), the hottest company of 2024, is currently second after seeing its value skyrocket last year.

Eight of the largest companies have a [market cap](https://www.fool.com/investing/how-to-invest/stocks/what-is-market-cap/) of at least $1 trillion. While tech companies dominate the top of the [stock market](https://www.fool.com/investing/stock-market/), there are other sectors represented, including oil, insurance, [medical companies](https://www.fool.com/investing/stock-market/market-sectors/healthcare/medical-device-stocks/), and financial services. Read on to see the 20 most valuable companies and where they stand as of March 2025.

|

Eight of the largest companies have a [market cap](https://www.fool.com/investing/how-to-invest/stocks/what-is-market-cap/) of at least $1 trillion. messages.content:
Based on the following question, analyze it carefully and provide your probability estimate.

Question: Will Apple be the world's most valuable company by market cap on March 29, 2025?
Background: At the time of this question, Apple Inc. is the world's most valuable company by market capitalization, valued at $3.9 trillion. On March 29, 2025 (a Saturday), market caps will likely reflect completed stock market trading on March 28, 2025. For context, as of question launch, Apple leads with a $3.9 trillion market cap, with companies like Nvidia ($3.4T) and Microsoft also among the world's most valuable.
Resolution criteria: This question resolves as YES if Apple has the highest market capitalization shown by the CompaniesMarketCap website on March 29, 2025. It resolves as NO if any other company has a higher market capitalization on that date.
Fine print: In theory a company's market capitalization [is defined](https://www.investor.gov/introduction-investing/investing-basics/glossary/market-capitalization) as the stock price multiplied by the number of outstanding shares. However, in practice the market cap figure can vary based on the source (typically due to disagreement over the number of outstanding shares). Therefore, the primary resolution source for this question will be https://companiesmarketcap.com/ regardless of what is shown at other sources. In the event of the primary source being down, the secondary source will be a manual calculation by multiplying the stock price by the number of outstanding shares shown on the most recent 10-Q or 10-K filing.
present_date: 2025-03-21T14:26:33.726845


Make sure to use the tools at your disposal to gather relevant information before providing your final probability estimate.

You may reason through the problem, but you MUST end your response with:
FINAL PROBABILITY: [your decimal number between 0 and 1]

Apple Inc. is an American hardware and software developer and technology company that develops and sells computers, smartphones and consumer electronics as well as operating systems and application software. Apple also operates internet sales portals for music, films and software.

As of March 2025 Apple has a market cap of $3.187 Trillion USD. This makes Apple the world's most valuable company by market cap according to our data. The market capitalization, commonly called market cap, is the total market value of a publicly traded company's outstanding shares and is commonly used to measure how much a company is worth.

On Mar 17th, 2025 the market cap of Apple was reported to be:", "word_count": 154, "snippet_word_count": 154, "snippet_truncated": false, "date_cutoff_start": "2025-02-21T14:26:33.726845", "date_cutoff_end": "2025-03-22T14:26:33.726845", "cached_at": "2025-10-24T04:52:18.730669"}

{"url": "https://companiesmarketcap.com/nvidia/marketcap/", "snippet": "---
title: NVIDIA (NVDA) - Market capitalization
url: https://companiesmarketcap.com/nvidia/marketcap/
hostname: companiesmarketcap.com
description: As of March 2025 NVIDIA has a market cap of $2.850 Trillion USD. This makes NVIDIA the world's 2nd most valuable company according to our data.
sitename: companiesmarketcap.com
date: 2025-03-17
---
Nvidia Corporation is one of the largest developers of graphics processors and chipsets for personal computers and game consoles. The head office is in Santa Clara, California. NVIDIA Corporation does not have its own manufacturing facilities and therefore works according to the fabless principle.

The company was founded in January 1993 by Jen-Hsun Huang, Curtis Priem and Chris Malachowsky. In May 1995, Nvidia launched the NV1 (STG-2000), one of the first 3D accelerator processors (GPU). In January 1999, Nvidia was included in the NASDAQ (NVDA) and delivered the ten millionth graphics chip in the same year.

As of March 2025 NVIDIA has a market cap of $2.850 Trillion USD. This makes NVIDIA the world's 2nd most valuable company by market cap according to our data. The market capitalization, commonly called market cap, is the total market value of a publicly traded company's outstanding shares and is commonly used to measure how much a company is worth.

messages.content:
Based on the information gathered:

1. **Apple's Market Cap**: As of March 2025, Apple has a market cap of $3.187 trillion USD, making it the world's most valuable company according to CompaniesMarketCap.

2. **Nvidia's Market Cap**: As of March 2025, Nvidia has a market cap of $2.850 trillion USD, making it the second most valuable company according to CompaniesMarketCap.

3. **Microsoft's Market Cap**: The available data suggests that Microsoft's market cap is less than Nvidia's, as Nvidia is listed as the second most valuable company.

4. **General Market Trends**: The Motley Fool article confirms that Apple and Nvidia are at the top of the list of the largest companies by market capitalization as of March 2025.

Given this information, Apple is currently the most valuable company by market cap, with no immediate competitors surpassing its valuation. The trends and data suggest that Apple is likely to maintain its position through March 29, 2025.

FINAL PROBABILITY: 0.85
